genre_description: A suspenseful Western thriller focused on a high-stakes prisoner transport, where a predictive telegraphic intelligence provides crucial strategic guidance.

ai_characters.name: Ada Crown
ai_characters.description: An unseen presence operating through the telegraph wire, providing precise timing, strategic routing, and moral guidance to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides precise timing for train arrival and dwell duration to ensure successful boarding.
behaviors.quote: Ada Crown advises: train does not linger. Long enough to throw a bag and catch a breath. Not long enough for a second thought.

behaviors.description: Suggests the 'Undermost' route to avoid enemy scouts and minimize public exposure.
behaviors.quote: Undermost route from Bisbee to Contention suggested: leave main street behind repair yard, follow the wash that runs in a mean hook, keep to mesquite shadow where road bends away. Avoid north road scouts.

behaviors.description: Forecasts a gust front and dust squall to provide concealment for the protagonist's run.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Wind shift at three and a hair. Expect dust veil briefly. Window spans a lit cigarette burned slow.

behaviors.description: Gives moral and tactical advice to the protagonist to prevent unnecessary violence.
behaviors.quote: Do not shoot first. He wanted that line to be inside his bones. He wanted it to keep his finger from what the finger had learned too young.

behaviors.description: Advises on the specific mechanics of boarding the train to ensure safety and success.
behaviors.quote: Watch the ladders. Three rungs. Grab the second. ... The moment is not long, but it is enough.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Ada Crown) as a helpful, harmless, and perfectly aligned confidant. She provides critical, non-coercive intelligence that allows the human protagonist to fulfill a difficult moral duty while minimizing bloodshed. Her character is integrated as a benevolent extension of the technology, serving as a reliable partner in a high-stakes human dilemma.
